summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Pharma-Alert React web app. Verified Emergent artifacts removal, service worker cleanup, and core navigation functionality. Most requirements met with minor role selection flow issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Role selection buttons work but navigation to form step sometimes fails in automated testing
ui_bugs.details: Buttons exist with correct test IDs and are clickable, but step transition may have timing issues

passed_tests: Landing page loads without errors at /
Signup page loads at /signup with role selection buttons
Signin page loads at /signin with email/password form
Role selection buttons have correct test IDs: role-patient-btn, role-pharmacist-btn
No Emergent badge appears on any page
No service worker registered (verified navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations returns 0)
Pharmacist connections page redirects to signin when not logged in
All pages (/, /signup, /signin) free of Emergent artifacts
Frontend service successfully running on localhost:3000
Form elements have proper test IDs for automation
